articles.description: MEGHAN Markle will 'likely raise eyebrows' with her latest legal move, a Royal Family expert has claimed, after she applied to trademark the word 'archetypes'.

articles.title: Kate Garraway details struggling with 'loss' amid husband Derek's Covid battle - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 54-year-old presenter spoke candidly about the struggle during Wednesday's episode of Your Body Uncovered, detailed how his ongoing health battle has put strain on their relationship.
articles.content:
Kate Garraway has detailed how she struggles with 'loss' amid her husband Derek Draper continues his lengthy recovery from Covid.

articles.title: Picasso portrait of lover and muse to appear at auction for first time - The Guardian
articles.description: Sotheby’s expects Femme nue couchée, which depicts Marie-Thérèse Walter as a sea-creature, to fetch over $60m next month
articles.content:
A sensuous depiction of Pablo Picassos muse and lover as a multi-limbed sea creature, completed during the most prolific year of the artists life, is to appear at auction for the first time.
